text: Shadrach Nosa Ogie (born 26 August 2001) is an Irish professional footballer who plays as a defender for Aldershot Town, on loan from Leyton Orient. ==Club career== ===Leyton Orient=== Born in Limerick, Republic of Ireland, Ogie played youth football for local club Pike Rovers. Upon moving to England, Ogie played football in Hornchurch's youth academy, before joining Leyton Orient in 2018. On 1 February 2019, after receiving international clearance from FIFA allowing him to play competitive football, Ogie signed a professional contract with Leyton Orient. The following day, Ogie made his debut for the club, playing 39 minutes in a 1–0 FA Trophy win against Blyth Spartans. In March 2019, Ogie was loaned out to Isthmian League club Bishop's Stortford, making seven appearances and scoring once. Following Leyton Orient's promotion back into the English Football League, Ogie's first appearance of the 2019–20 season came in a 2–0 EFL Trophy win against Southend United. ====Dover Athletic (loan)==== On 17 January 2020, Ogie joined Dover Athletic on loan. He made his debut for the club in a 0-0 away draw at Notts County and scored his first goal for the club the following week with a superb solo effort in a 2-0 victory over Aldershot Town. ====Aldershot Town (loan)==== Ogie joined Aldershot Town on an initial one month loan deal on 3 October 2020. ==International career== On 21 March 2019, Ogie made his debut for Republic of Ireland under-18's in a 4–0 loss against Turkey U18, a month after making his under-19 debut for Ireland on 5 February 2019. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Leyton Orient |2018–19 |National League |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||1||0||1||0 |- |2019–20 |League Two |0||0||0||0||0||0||3||0||3||0 |- |2020–21 |League Two |0||0||0||0||0||0||1||0||1||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!5!!0!!5!!0 |- |Bishop's Stortford |2018–19 |Isthmian League Premier Division |7||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||7||1 |- |Dover Athletic (loan) |2019–20 |National League |8||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||8||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career Total !15!!2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!5!!0!!20!!2 |- |} ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Association footballers from County Limerick Category:Republic of Ireland association footballers Category:Black Irish sportspeople Category:Republic of Ireland youth international footballers Category:Isthmian League players Category:National League (English football) players Category:Leyton Orient F.C. players Category:Bishop's Stortford F.C. players Category:Dover Athletic F.C. players
title: Shadrach Ogie
